00ade0264fae96a50e1d496a0affee5d9b3f29a4.query:
DELETE FROM snapshot
                WHERE snapshot_name NOT IN (SELECT * FROM UNNEST ($1::text[]))
                AND filesystem_name=$2::text

034a0cbc5825b50fb7075c5fe84c0161fec48da8.query:
UPDATE alertstate
            SET message = $1
            WHERE
                id = $2

039bf2882ae846ec8c1ac9ec8651c1e32e298f6f.query:
SELECT
                rh.cluster_id,
                r.name as resource_id,
                t.id as target_id,
                t.name,
                t.mount_path,
                t.filesystems,
                t.uuid,
                t.state,
                array_agg(DISTINCT rh.host_id) AS "cluster_hosts!"
            FROM target t
            INNER JOIN corosync_resource r ON r.mount_point = t.mount_path
            INNER JOIN corosync_resource_host rh ON rh.corosync_resource_id = r.name AND rh.host_id = ANY(t.host_ids)
            WHERE CARDINALITY(t.filesystems) > 0
            GROUP BY rh.cluster_id, t.name, r.name, t.mount_path, t.uuid, t.filesystems, t.state, t.id

044c83becc9a4280aa888bab7106a2fb5501c1a2.query:
SELECT
                (n.id).name AS "name!",
                (n.id).id AS "id!",
                cluster_id,
                online,
                standby,
                standby_onfail,
                maintenance,
                pending,
                unclean,
                shutdown,
                expected_up,
                is_dc,
                resources_running,
                type
                FROM corosync_node n
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $1 = 'ASC' THEN n.id END ASC,
                    CASE WHEN $1 = 'DESC' THEN n.id END DESC
                OFFSET $2 LIMIT $3

07767288975c9aadda08a229c228dcf67f76f2b0.query: SELECT id FROM ostpool_osts WHERE ostpool_id = $1 AND ost_id = $2

0a94881075a6bd0601f0f2ac66415ff2e5ffae9d.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_cluster
            USING corosync_node_host
            WHERE host_id = $1
            AND cluster_id = id
            AND corosync_nodes != $2::corosync_node_key[]

0f417e6561a586978f669b0df76c12b73c43a63e.query: DELETE FROM ostpool WHERE filesystem_id = $1 AND name = $2

10c20be4c885068efeb3e30dce99242cc4babc20.query:
INSERT INTO sfacontroller
        (
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            health_state,
            health_state_reason,
            child_health_state,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::int[],
            $2::int[],
            $3::smallint[],
            $4::text[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system) DO UPDATE
        SET
            enclosure_index = excluded.enclosure_index,
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            child_health_state = excluded.child_health_state

12b039adc74d7bebed739164545198b3de53a449.query:
SELECT
            id,
            state,
            name,
            dev_path,
            active_host_id,
            host_ids,
            filesystems,
            uuid,
            mount_path,
            fs_type as "fs_type: FsType"
        FROM target

1471af35238edc9370c4b57a8b16883c4ff9666e.query:
SELECT 
                index,
                enclosure_index,
                failed,
                slot_number,
                health_state  as "health_state: _",
                health_state_reason,
                member_index,
                member_state as "member_state: _",
                storage_system
            FROM sfadiskdrive

1506af61e39ee58dafd3f9dd9b9bda6d7598eb41.query:
SELECT
            id,
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            health_state as "health_state: HealthState",
            health_state_reason,
            position,
            storage_system
        FROM sfapowersupply

1567f1f1614c4f3741d9f413499453d5b579253d.query:
SELECT
            index,
            sub_target_index,
            sub_target_type as "sub_target_type: _",
            job_type as "job_type: _",
            state as "state: _",
            storage_system
        FROM sfajob

17645262c426038efcc8e22bf999c0d3cee07f52.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    filesystem_name,
                    reserve_value,
                    reserve_unit as "reserve_unit:ReserveUnit",
                    last_run,
                    keep_num
                FROM snapshot_retention

19d5cea27f5d5308d57c69280bd88201e5d995b5.query:
SELECT n.nid FROM target AS t
            INNER JOIN lnet as l ON l.host_id = ANY(t.host_ids)
            INNER JOIN nid as n ON n.id = ANY(l.nids)
            WHERE t.name='MGS' AND $1 = ANY(t.filesystems)
            AND n.host_id NOT IN (
                SELECT nh.host_id
                FROM corosync_resource_bans b
                INNER JOIN corosync_node_host nh ON (nh.corosync_node_id).name = b.node
                AND nh.cluster_id = b.cluster_id
                INNER JOIN corosync_resource r ON r.name = b.resource AND b.cluster_id = r.cluster_id
                WHERE r.mount_point is not NULL AND r.mount_point = t.mount_path
            )
            GROUP BY l.host_id, n.nid ORDER BY l.host_id, n.nid

19e5503848b0884071dc63a00d341f5ae47fd531.query:
SELECT
            id,
            uuid,
            platform,
            health_state_reason,
            health_state as "health_state: HealthState",
            child_health_state as "child_health_state: HealthState"
        FROM sfastoragesystem

1cc41f526860fb071f25210fb0c8e661055342e1.query:
SELECT id, state, name, active_host_id, host_ids, filesystems, uuid, mount_path, dev_path, fs_type as "fs_type: FsType" from target t
                ORDER BY
                    CASE WHEN $3 = 'ASC' THEN t.name END ASC,
                    CASE WHEN $3 = 'DESC' THEN t.name END DESC
                OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

1f2f8958f0806630e2200e13a5664a0316b9ccae.query:
UPDATE task
        SET fids_total = fids_total + $1
        WHERE id = $2

206631a67f0d3a2ce9a5cb3625f7e8cdc429acdf.query:
INSERT INTO alertstate
        (
            record_type,
            variant,
            alert_item_id,
            alert_type,
            begin,
            message,
            active,
            dismissed,
            severity,
            lustre_pid,
            alert_item_type_id
        )
        VALUES ($1::alert_record_type, '{}', $2, $1, now(), $3, true, false, $4, $5, $6)
        ON CONFLICT ON CONSTRAINT unique_active_alert DO NOTHING

210cd9361cb26fcfee367e411816ef47e452aedc.query:
INSERT INTO sfapowersupply
        (
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            health_state,
            health_state_reason,
            position,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::integer[],
            $2::integer[],
            $3::smallint[],
            $4::text[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system, enclosure_index) DO UPDATE
        SET
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            position = excluded.position

2361c5f9e39cfab55012cc55e12189baac5ed977.query:
DELETE FROM fidtaskqueue 
        WHERE id in ( 
            SELECT id FROM fidtaskqueue WHERE task_id = $1 LIMIT $2 FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED 
        ) RETURNING id, fid as "fid: _", data, task_id

24bb635112fb4b5b72ac73fb8ecefcb7ea62a384.query:
SELECT
            id,
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            health_state as "health_state: HealthState",
            health_state_reason,
            child_health_state as "child_health_state: HealthState",
            storage_system
        FROM sfacontroller

265ffd576ccd92631fcec20125129f1562246a5b.query:
SELECT b.resource as "resource!", b.cluster_id as "cluster_id!",
                   nh.host_id as "host_id!", t.mount_point
            FROM corosync_resource_bans b
            INNER JOIN corosync_node_host nh ON (nh.corosync_node_id).name = b.node
            AND nh.cluster_id = b.cluster_id
            INNER JOIN corosync_resource t ON t.name = b.resource AND b.cluster_id = t.cluster_id
            WHERE t.mount_point is not NULL

272e3387251a0a65d1edb3f4bfca25149e88e6df.query:
DELETE from sfaenclosure
            WHERE (index, storage_system)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[])
            )

295d3ff42ef30c446dd844419ae17e001cb7fbed.query:
INSERT INTO logmessage
             (datetime, fqdn, severity, facility, tag, message, message_class)
             SELECT datetime, $2, severity, facility, source, message, message_class
             FROM UNNEST($1::timestamptz[], $3::smallint[], $4::smallint[], $5::text[], $6::text[], $7::smallint[])
             AS t(datetime, severity, facility, source, message, message_class)

2ca5ebb5ddbdf4dd26e6a2baff56562b8d0a68c8.query:
INSERT INTO filesystemticket
                            (ticket_ptr_id, filesystem_id)
                            VALUES
                            ($1, $2)
                            ON CONFLICT (ticket_ptr_id)
                            DO UPDATE SET
                            filesystem_id = EXCLUDED.filesystem_id

2fb60ed255b3d49fd066b02c47e3e3952cf1bbe0.query:
DELETE FROM logmessage
                WHERE id in (
                    SELECT id FROM logmessage ORDER BY id LIMIT $1
                )

32c87fb80feea826ef2df2696220c30998081844.query:
SELECT
                id,
                alert_item_type_id as "alert_item_type_id: ComponentType",
                alert_item_id,
                alert_type,
                begin,
                "end",
                active,
                dismissed,
                severity as "severity: AlertSeverity",
                record_type as "record_type: AlertRecordType",
                variant,
                lustre_pid,
                message
            FROM alertstate WHERE active = 't'

3338a1a1fd3309acfbcdcc1c16fb3b51fb1d30e3.query: SELECT ost_id FROM ostpool_osts WHERE ostpool_id = $1

33a5d7631d5a8d64882371b06f6ec8a8d0e23902.query:
SELECT id, plan, state as "state: State"
            FROM command_plan WHERE id = $1

36eaa3a68bb597f0fd1e9dd92b6ca5aac60d2feb.query:

                WHERE host_id = $1

391dd54d5f2161594ab7e77f41c7368e547369bc.query:

INSERT INTO snapshot_interval (
                    filesystem_name,

                )

3b59e973677758c24454fe7bf4fe126ceb663ead.query:
SELECT id, plan, state as "state: State"
            FROM command_plan

3b87fce6dce80a66ed29a4b271afc989aab7a157.query:

            FROM target t

            ON t.active_host_id = h.id
            WHERE $1 = ANY(t.filesystems)

3ea0ec00da15dcb0f07bd9877e5af0a6925fd4d6.query:
INSERT INTO host (machine_id, fqdn, boot_time, state)
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, 'up')
                ON CONFLICT (machine_id) DO UPDATE
                SET
                    fqdn = excluded.fqdn,
                    boot_time = excluded.boot_time,
                    state = excluded.state

458e27e1f681e8600663c211191f4a5a4f19801e.query:

45af175923382837733407cab5f3fa02f1a14ea4.query: SELECT active_host_id from target WHERE filesystems @> $1 and name='MGS'

45e66b9722e3f0ea68049efc3ce9a52ac0ccc202.query:
SELECT
                    id,
                    filesystem_name,
                    reserve_value,
                    reserve_unit as "reserve_unit:snapshot::ReserveUnit",
                    last_run,
                    keep_num
                FROM snapshot_retention

4eb28fbaf2c42bbcc852c074ade355c4f29c318d.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_node (
                id,
                cluster_id,
                online,
                standby,
                standby_onfail,
                maintenance,
                pending,
                unclean,
                shutdown,
                expected_up,
                is_dc,
                resources_running,
                type
            )
            SELECT
                id::corosync_node_key,
                $13,
                online,
                standby,
                standby_onfail,
                maintenance,
                pending,
                unclean,
                shutdown,
                expected_up,
                is_dc,
                resources_running,
                type
            FROM UNNEST(
                $1::text[],
                $2::bool[],
                $3::bool[],
                $4::bool[],
                $5::bool[],
                $6::bool[],
                $7::bool[],
                $8::bool[],
                $9::bool[],
                $10::bool[],
                $11::int[],
                $12::text[]
            )
            AS t(
                id,
                online,
                standby,
                standby_onfail,
                maintenance,
                pending,
                unclean,
                shutdown,
                expected_up,
                is_dc,
                resources_running,
                type
            )
            ON CONFLICT (id, cluster_id) DO UPDATE
            SET
                online = excluded.online,
                standby = excluded.standby,
                standby_onfail = excluded.standby_onfail,
                maintenance = excluded.maintenance,
                pending = excluded.pending,
                unclean = excluded.unclean,
                shutdown = excluded.shutdown,
                expected_up = excluded.expected_up,
                is_dc = excluded.is_dc,
                resources_running = excluded.resources_running,
                type = excluded.type

4efb4eca0f9e7e6365fc82c465610f2f85861860.query:
INSERT INTO sfadiskdrive
        (
            index,
            enclosure_index,
            failed,
            slot_number,
            health_state,
            health_state_reason,
            member_index,
            member_state,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::integer[],
            $2::integer[],
            $3::bool[],
            $4::integer[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[],
            $7::smallint[],
            $8::smallint[],
            $9::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system) DO UPDATE
        SET
            enclosure_index = excluded.enclosure_index,
            failed = excluded.failed,
            slot_number = excluded.slot_number,
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            member_index = excluded.member_index,
            member_state = excluded.member_state

4f16874f4506c43628a3d68844fbe89fd9bd59cd.query:
SELECT id FROM corosync_cluster
            WHERE corosync_nodes = $1::corosync_node_key[]

65143183f73922141fb7b504837fb08a82637e11.query:

            SET 
                mountpoints = array[]::text[],
                state = 'unmounted',
                state_modified_at = now()
            WHERE host_id = $1
            AND id != ALL($2)

693ae3aa595002e8038be9a738293c4105ae581b.query:
INSERT INTO sfaenclosure
        (
            index,
            element_name,
            health_state,
            health_state_reason,
            child_health_state,
            model,
            position,
            enclosure_type,
            canister_location,
            storage_system
        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(
            $1::integer[],
            $2::text[],
            $3::smallint[],
            $4::text[],
            $5::smallint[],
            $6::text[],
            $7::smallint[],
            $8::smallint[],
            $9::text[],
            $10::text[]
        )
        ON CONFLICT (index, storage_system) DO UPDATE
        SET
            child_health_state = excluded.child_health_state,
            element_name = excluded.element_name,
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            position = excluded.position,
            enclosure_type = excluded.enclosure_type

6c136ba1758c1d572b982bcfd3dfc5664c536cb7.query:
SELECT

            health_state_reason,
            position,
            storage_system
        FROM sfapowersupply

6d4150795d1dd4d77f8741d5f06ac94d95898156.query:
INSERT INTO fidtaskqueue (fid, data, task_id)
            SELECT row(seq, oid, ver)::lustre_fid, '{}'::jsonb, $4
            FROM UNNEST($1::bigint[], $2::int[], $3::int[])
            AS t(seq, oid, ver)

6d7c1af5cf5e15bc84444013fa6989b6317052dc.query:
INSERT INTO snapshot (filesystem_name, snapshot_name, create_time, modify_time, snapshot_fsname, mounted, comment)
            SELECT * FROM
            UNNEST (
                $1::text[],
                $2::text[],
                $3::timestamp[],
                $4::timestamp[],
                $5::text[],
                $6::bool[],
                $7::text[]
            )
            ON CONFLICT (filesystem_name, snapshot_name) DO UPDATE
            SET
                create_time = excluded.create_time,
                modify_time = excluded.modify_time,
                snapshot_fsname = excluded.snapshot_fsname,
                mounted = excluded.mounted,
                comment = excluded.comment

6debebdd4f94b4bb0be08a4a55a5665af436b40e.query:

                    (ticket_ptr_id, mgs_id)

                    DO UPDATE SET

            WHERE (index, storage_system)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[])
            )

78c83e52af6acf0729cccc61fa4dd809ac1c3d4c.query:
UPDATE ticket SET
                state_modified_at = now(),
                state = $1,
                name = $2,
                ha_label = $2,
                resource_controlled = 't',
                cluster_id = $3
            WHERE id = $4

7998c41fd29292127a8f173e2576474a857785d2.query:
INSERT INTO sfajob
        (
            index,
            sub_target_index,
            sub_target_type,

        )
        SELECT * FROM UNNEST(

7d72b7ee3727f3dfb9e357ff90cfa2590f3faaf7.query:
SELECT

            index,
            sub_target_index,
            sub_target_type as "sub_target_type: SubTargetType",

        FROM sfajob

802920713e7e6e964e6411ddd402fd0fabf931c7.query: SELECT fqdn FROM host WHERE id = $1

805ce2041e0f2f1ee3116ad4a7304623977df952.query:
UPDATE ticket t
            SET state = updates.state
            FROM (
                SELECT state, id
                FROM UNNEST($1::text[], $2::text[])
                AS t(state, id)
            ) AS updates
            WHERE
                t.ha_label = updates.id
                AND t.cluster_id = $3

827706b2ed73fd74e93f1c73409a7faf8249c6b4.query: SELECT total_rows FROM rowcount WHERE table_name = 'logmessage'

87f6516cd9325e66b59d97a106bf81c548d24bee.query: UPDATE command_plan SET plan = $1, state = $2 WHERE id = $3

887609a7e7ea9cef95029792894dd387b682e22a.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_resource_host
            WHERE corosync_resource_id != ALL($1)
            AND host_id = $2

8ac87d0e2c016985d993de3824a253423b3aa038.query:
UPDATE snapshot_interval
                SET last_run=$1
                WHERE id=$2 AND filesystem_name=$3

8b5ac082a93a3c9996dd9f066cf944cacf48e882.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_resource_bans (name, cluster_id, resource, node, weight, master_only)
            SELECT
                name,
                $6,
                resource,
                node,
                weight,
                master_only
            FROM UNNEST(
                $1::text[],
                $2::text[],
                $3::text[],
                $4::int[],
                $5::bool[]
            )
            AS t(
                name,
                resource,
                node,
                weight,
                master_only
            )
            ON CONFLICT (name, cluster_id, resource, node) DO UPDATE
            SET
                weight = excluded.weight,
                master_only = excluded.master_only

8c3d80b0bc33f1cd4270bdaf069bccc9edee4dec.query:
INSERT INTO lustreclientmount
        (host_id, filesystem, mountpoints, state, state_modified_at)
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, 'mounted', now())
        ON CONFLICT (host_id, filesystem) DO UPDATE
        SET 
            mountpoints = excluded.mountpoints,
            state = excluded.state,
            state_modified_at = excluded.state_modified_at
        RETURNING id

8c701f90a7c38d026057e6173fba24a5e0066f85.query: SELECT id FROM ostpool WHERE name=$1 AND filesystem_id=$2

8e5e165916fdd01aa0857559a0115f2c79d82190.query: SELECT total_rows FROM rowcount WHERE table_name = 'alertstate'

8ebf523eac96d3a87e41494d0387edc03485a99b.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_resource_host (host_id, cluster_id, corosync_resource_id)
                SELECT $1, $2, corosync_resource_id FROM UNNEST($3::text[]) as corosync_resource_id
                ON CONFLICT (host_id, corosync_resource_id, cluster_id)
                DO NOTHING

90c803467b35e36f05da795824e0075d94e1ebab.query:
INSERT INTO fidtaskerror (fid, task_id, data, errno)
                                                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)

9293e43b6dc19cbe3ad961151f4f9317529e0f05.query:
INSERT INTO filesystem (
                        state,
                        name,
                        mdt_next_index,
                        ost_next_index,
                        mgs_id,
                        mdt_ids,
                        ost_ids
                    ) VALUES (
                        $1,
                        $2,
                        $3,
                        $4,
                        $5,
                        $6,
                        $7
                    )
                    RETURNING id

939f78bde09bb5792acde034038ea2142c7b48d1.query:
UPDATE alertstate
            SET active = false, "end" = now()
            WHERE
                active = true
                AND alert_item_id = $1
                AND record_type::text = ANY($2)

9bc21bd7e2f9506e3ae0cb80fd80e0fc95243470.query: SELECT * FROM snapshot WHERE filesystem_name = $1 ORDER BY create_time ASC

9d7a06beed576750ad22c14d9f8b28278b6fb458.query:
INSERT INTO device
        (fqdn, devices)
        VALUES ($1, $2)
        ON CONFLICT (fqdn) DO UPDATE
        SET devices = EXCLUDED.devices

9e0754b5fde2e3e009e47ad07c3224a3ff550961.query:
select * from task
        where
            filesystem_id = $1
            and state <> 'closed'
            and fids_total > fids_completed 
            and (running_on_id is Null or running_on_id = $2)

9ef05ffa0bf38929a77aaf9ee7838a03c358401f.query: SELECT id, message FROM alertstate WHERE lustre_pid = $1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

9f2b6ffb54437e3b171b5d200f53e80e938d5c0e.query:
UPDATE task
            SET 
                fids_completed = fids_completed + $1,
                fids_failed = fids_failed + $2
            WHERE id = $3

a2727dca1735df5efbc77bcb03e456f3e9280a85.query:
INSERT INTO sfastoragesystem
        (
            uuid,
            platform,
            health_state_reason,
            health_state,
            child_health_state
        )
        VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)
        ON CONFLICT (uuid) DO UPDATE
        SET
            platform = excluded.platform,
            health_state_reason = excluded.health_state_reason,
            health_state = excluded.health_state,
            child_health_state = excluded.child_health_state

a3ea22f86de844f7a1c2d9c0a696285e53f0c57b.query: INSERT INTO ostpool (name, filesystem_id) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING id

a5431f80b389bda64036b3b822760557370d309b.query:
SELECT
                o.id,
                o.name,
                f.name AS filesystem,
                array_agg((
                    SELECT DISTINCT t.name FROM target t
                    INNER JOIN ostpool_osts oo ON oo.ostpool_id = o.id
                    WHERE t.id = oo.ost_id
                )) AS "osts!"
            FROM ostpool o
            INNER JOIN filesystem f ON f.id = o.filesystem_id
            WHERE ($1::text IS NULL OR f.name = $1)
            AND ($2::text IS NULL OR o.name = $2)
            GROUP BY o.id, f.name

a5e14b628a8f67d458167f1ea5d0390aacd72b92.query:
WITH updated AS (
                INSERT INTO nid
                (net_type, host_id, nid, status, interfaces)
                SELECT net_type, host_id, nid, status, string_to_array(interfaces, ',')::text[]
                FROM UNNEST($1::text[], $2::int[], $3::text[], $4::text[], $5::text[])
                AS t(net_type, host_id, nid, status, interfaces)
                ON CONFLICT (host_id, nid)
                    DO
                    UPDATE SET  net_type      = EXCLUDED.net_type,
                                status        = EXCLUDED.status,
                                interfaces    = EXCLUDED.interfaces
                RETURNING id
            )

            INSERT INTO lnet
            (host_id, state, nids)
            (SELECT $6, $7, array_agg(id) from updated)
            ON CONFLICT (host_id)
                DO
                UPDATE SET nids  = EXCLUDED.nids,
                           state = EXCLUDED.state;

ab46826b0b4a5379bb056c6cd900c403afc33b95.query:
SELECT
                    name,
                    mount_path,
                    filesystems,
                    uuid,
                    state,
                    id
                FROM target
                WHERE CARDINALITY(filesystems) > 0

acce0ef57e02705ad538be4229e49aca7b61cab3.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_cluster (corosync_nodes)
                VALUES ($1::corosync_node_key[])
                ON CONFLICT (corosync_nodes) DO NOTHING

b644f3d271a1d645e3ebf7efc61c610107314920.query:
DELETE from sfacontroller
            WHERE (index, storage_system)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[])
            )

b7e5fc0a16a72ed9f164b09842b1ba1df32abd06.query:
INSERT INTO target
                        (state, name, active_host_id, host_ids, filesystems, uuid, mount_path, dev_path, fs_type)
                        SELECT state, name, active_host_id, string_to_array(host_ids, ',')::int[], string_to_array(filesystems, ',')::text[], uuid, mount_path, dev_path, fs_type
                        FROM UNNEST($1::text[], $2::text[], $3::int[], $4::text[], $5::text[], $6::text[], $7::text[], $8::text[], $9::fs_type[])
                        AS t(state, name, active_host_id, host_ids, filesystems, uuid, mount_path, dev_path, fs_type)
                        ON CONFLICT (name, uuid)
                            DO
                            UPDATE SET  state          = EXCLUDED.state,
                                        active_host_id = EXCLUDED.active_host_id,
                                        host_ids       = EXCLUDED.host_ids,
                                        filesystems    = EXCLUDED.filesystems,
                                        mount_path     = EXCLUDED.mount_path,
                                        dev_path       = EXCLUDED.dev_path,
                                        fs_type        = EXCLUDED.fs_type

b809a2c3c004d0de127f801ad1f688da7dae8308.query:
INSERT INTO fidtaskqueue (fid, data, task_id)
            SELECT row(seq, oid, ver)::lustre_fid, data, $5
            FROM UNNEST($1::bigint[], $2::int[], $3::int[], $4::jsonb[])
            AS t(seq, oid, ver, data)

b90d797530fd50b0596cbdc7bce108066fc5c4e8.query: SELECT id, filesystem_name, snapshot_name, snapshot_fsname FROM snapshot

ba8cee7f0b30b8c74253807a935ca4861e301e11.query:
INSERT INTO ticket (
                state_modified_at,
                state,
                ha_label,
                name,
                resource_controlled,
                cluster_id
            ) VALUES (now(), $1, $2, $2, 't', $3)
        RETURNING id

bec714dda53dc06d09fcebc82d0db1559923c53d.query:
SELECT filesystem_name, snapshot_name, create_time, modify_time, snapshot_fsname, mounted, comment FROM snapshot s
                    WHERE filesystem_name = $4 AND ($5::text IS NULL OR snapshot_name = $5)
                    ORDER BY
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'ASC' THEN s.create_time END ASC,
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'DESC' THEN s.create_time END DESC
                    OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

c1b140f44c91d1fed4ac89c11e206138deda02e6.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_resource
            USING corosync_resource_host
            WHERE name = corosync_resource_id
            AND corosync_resource_id != ALL($1)
            AND host_id = $2

c2fc438e19db8f14a3010343d8ca28c38d2b82ec.query:
SELECT t.id
            FROM target AS t
            WHERE $1 = ANY(t.filesystems)
            AND name = $2

c4796fbc4fa01566e0fd4d3fd711df6f68c3403f.query:
DELETE from sfapowersupply
            WHERE (index, storage_system, enclosure_index)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[], $3::int[])
            )

c68c09b70b685dbd2f2465174bc63b1e03b4e685.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_node
            USING corosync_node_host
            WHERE id = corosync_node_id
            AND host_id = $1
            AND corosync_node_id != ALL($2::corosync_node_key[])

c6916b0f4900fe7c347496e209abd99de5b43c10.query:
INSERT INTO corosync_resource (
            name,
            cluster_id,
            resource_agent,
            role,
            active,
            orphaned,
            managed,
            failed,
            failure_ignored,
            nodes_running_on,
            active_node,
            mount_point
        )
        SELECT
            name,
            $12,
            resource_agent,
            role,
            active,
            orphaned,
            managed,
            failed,
            failure_ignored,
            nodes_running_on,
            active_node::corosync_node_key,
            mount_point
        FROM UNNEST(
                $1::text[],
                $2::text[],
                $3::text[],
                $4::bool[],
                $5::bool[],
                $6::bool[],
                $7::bool[],
                $8::bool[],
                $9::int[],
                $10::text[],
                $11::text[]
            )
            AS t(
            name,
            resource_agent,
            role,
            active,
            orphaned,
            managed,
            failed,
            failure_ignored,
            nodes_running_on,
            active_node,
            mount_point
            )
            ON CONFLICT (name, cluster_id) DO UPDATE
            SET
                resource_agent = excluded.resource_agent,
                role = excluded.role,
                active = excluded.active,
                orphaned = excluded.orphaned,
                managed = excluded.managed,
                failed = excluded.failed,
                failure_ignored = excluded.failure_ignored,
                nodes_running_on = excluded.nodes_running_on,
                active_node = excluded.active_node,
                mount_point = excluded.mount_point

c8eaf4d9a1c9323e7f4e5956beb0a046c2c67070.query: SELECT fqdn FROM host WHERE id=$1

c9f733dc3958a75b638d7c6f567e6fccf89575ac.query:
SELECT id, name, cluster_id, resource_agent, role, active, orphaned, managed,
            failed, failure_ignored, nodes_running_on, (active_node).id AS active_node_id,
            (active_node).name AS active_node_name, mount_point
        FROM corosync_resource

cd46c31e97b4cc0eb8c15ea3ca2346eb96cc2c12.query: SELECT id FROM filesystem WHERE name = $1

cde388689549f3bfbfb2a5930d175a51450bfda9.query:
SELECT * from stratagemconfiguration
            WHERE ($1::int IS NULL OR filesystem_id = $1)

cdf167123e7c6a3d1230b58aab4fa7e448eb02d4.query:
SELECT
                        id,
                        alert_item_type_id AS "alert_item_type_id: ComponentType",
                        alert_item_id,
                        alert_type,
                        "begin",
                        "end",
                        active,
                        dismissed,
                        severity AS "severity: AlertSeverity",
                        record_type AS "record_type: AlertRecordType",
                        variant,
                        lustre_pid,
                        message
                    FROM alertstate a
                    WHERE ($4::TEXT IS NULL OR a.message LIKE $4)
                      AND ($5::BOOL IS NULL OR a.active = $5)
                      AND ($6::TIMESTAMPTZ IS NULL OR a.begin >= $6)
                      AND ($7::TIMESTAMPTZ IS NULL OR a.end <= $7)
                      AND ($8::text[] IS NULL OR a.record_type::text = ANY($8::text[]))
                      AND a.severity <= $9
                    ORDER BY
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'ASC' THEN a.begin END ASC,
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'DESC' THEN a.begin END DESC
                    OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

d25d9b947b944996f36160c464abe1097b6aab8e.query:
INSERT INTO task (
                    name,
                    start,
                    state,
                    fids_total,
                    fids_completed,
                    fids_failed,
                    data_transfered,
                    single_runner,
                    keep_failed,
                    actions,
                    args,
                    filesystem_id
                )
                VALUES (
                    $1,
                    now(),
                    $2,
                    0,
                    0,
                    0,
                    0,
                    $3,
                    $4,
                    $5,
                    $6,
                    $7
                )
                RETURNING *

d7ca572dea5a2cf4808b129fe1e6254d6ba1a737.query:
UPDATE task
            SET running_on_id = $1
                WHERE id = $2
                AND running_on_id is Null

d8a59e037df626cf165dd3a30bee10aa813b3fa8.query:
UPDATE filesystem SET
                    state_modified_at = now(),
                    state = 'available',
                    mgs_id = $1

dc969e1cf438fc20baccd36a43cf7725bcf95cf7.query:
INSERT INTO snapshot_retention (
                    filesystem_name,
                    reserve_value,
                    reserve_unit,
                    keep_num
                )
                VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4)
                ON CONFLICT (filesystem_name)
                DO UPDATE SET
                reserve_value = EXCLUDED.reserve_value,
                reserve_unit = EXCLUDED.reserve_unit,
                keep_num = EXCLUDED.keep_num

dcba69545a69ac3dcee705aed95e52074cbe6a6a.query:
DELETE from sfadiskdrive
            WHERE (index, storage_system)
            IN (
                SELECT *
                FROM UNNEST($1::int[], $2::text[])
            )

e211fee58a58a67ae21206e84802a76ce81d15f4.query:
SELECT
            id,
            filesystem_name,
            reserve_value,
            reserve_unit as "reserve_unit:ReserveUnit",
            last_run,
            keep_num
        FROM snapshot_retention

e496c9cb765e35a0c893fdec50cd2948d7b940e0.query:
SELECT * FROM lustreclientmount
        WHERE
            state = 'mounted'
            AND id != ALL($1)
        LIMIT $2

ec0d6964e1d518f23086eba95dc1ae7017cc3b64.query:
DELETE FROM corosync_resource_bans
            USING corosync_node_host
            WHERE host_id = $1
            AND node = (corosync_node_id).name
            AND name != ALL($2)

ee8e578a3f384e73921dca66f3c76a10487a4217.query: SELECT id FROM host WHERE machine_id = $1 AND state = 'up'

f50133338ce3a38a6d802bb83a31c74b96a9e923.query: select id from filesystem where name = $1

f6127cf6abc3176cffc5e7cf7be3cdd330bdb474.query:
SELECT * FROM logmessage t
                    WHERE ($4::TEXT IS NULL OR t.message LIKE $4)
                      AND ($5::TEXT IS NULL OR t.fqdn LIKE $5)
                      AND ($6::TEXT IS NULL OR t.tag LIKE $6)
                      AND ($7::TIMESTAMPTZ IS NULL OR t.datetime >= $7)
                      AND ($8::TIMESTAMPTZ IS NULL OR t.datetime < $8)
                      AND ARRAY[t.message_class] <@ $9
                      AND t.severity <= $10
                    ORDER BY
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'ASC' THEN t.datetime END ASC,
                        CASE WHEN $3 = 'DESC' THEN t.datetime END DESC
                    OFFSET $1 LIMIT $2

f872f22fda9c049aa8553e731b4dcdd85d15fbb5.query:
SELECT
            index,
            element_name,
            health_state as "health_state: _",
            health_state_reason,
            child_health_state as "child_health_state: _",
            model,
            position,
            enclosure_type as "enclosure_type: _",
            canister_location,
            storage_system
        FROM sfaenclosure

f98f8c6f1fb7cdffb434c4cc4f9b2fe23c553b5d.query:
INSERT INTO network_interface 
            (mac_address, name, inet4_address, inet6_address, lnd_type, state_up, host_id)
            SELECT mac_address, name, string_to_array(inet4_address, ',')::inet[], string_to_array(inet6_address, ',')::inet[], lnd_type, state_up, host_id
            FROM UNNEST($1::text[], $2::text[], $3::text[], $4::text[], $5::lnd_network_type[], $6::bool[], $7::int[])
            AS t(mac_address, name, inet4_address, inet6_address, lnd_type, state_up, host_id)
            ON CONFLICT (mac_address)
                DO
                UPDATE SET  name          = EXCLUDED.name,
                            inet4_address = EXCLUDED.inet4_address,
                            inet6_address = EXCLUDED.inet6_address,
                            lnd_type      = EXCLUDED.lnd_type,
                            state_up      = EXCLUDED.state_up,
                            host_id       = EXCLUDED.host_id

ff665ccfecba5163af63c1cea7652c54d31d79fd.query: SELECT state, name, active_host_id, host_ids, filesystems, uuid, mount_path, dev_path, fs_type AS "fs_type: FsType" FROM target
